company.description: The company the user belongs to.

role.description: The user's role in the system.

status.description: The current status of the user's account.

avatar.description: URL to the user's avatar image.

lastLogin.description: Timestamp of the user's last login.

isOnline.description: Indicates if the user is currently considered online.

lastSeen.description: Timestamp of when the user was last active.

pricingTiers.description: A map of supplier-specific pricing tiers.

preferredSupplierContacts.description: A map of preferred supplier contacts.

filtrationOptions.description: A list of filtration types offered by a Mobile Service Provider.

signatureUrl.description: URL to the user's signature image.

WineryVessel.title: Winery Vessel
WineryVessel.description: Represents a single tank or barrel group in a producer's cellar.

name.description: The unique name or code for the vessel (e.g., 'T101', '2023 Merlot Barrels').

capacityLitres.description: The total capacity of the vessel in litres.

barrelCount.description: For barrel groups, the number of barrels.

currentContents.description: A description of the wine currently held in the vessel.

CellarLogEntry.title: Cellar Log Entry
CellarLogEntry.description: Represents a single action taken on a wine, such as adding a product.

vesselId.description: The ID of the vessel the action was performed on.

vesselName.description: The name of the vessel at the time of logging.

productId.description: The ID of the product that was added.

productName.description: The name of the product that was added.

quantityUsed.description: The amount of the product used (e.g., in grams or mL).

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the quantity used.

reason.description: The reason for the addition or action.

producerEmail.description: The email of the producer who performed the action.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profiles for all users.

/users/{userId}/vessels/{vesselId}.description: Stores the winery vessels for a specific producer.

/users/{userId}/cellar-log/{logEntryId}.description: Stores the immutable log of cellar activities for a producer.
